page.title: 19FASHION IN 1985
page.content: TODAYS FASHION IS WEARING WHAT YOU LIKE TO WEAR.MOST TEENAGERS CONFORM TO WHAT 'EVERYONE' IS WEARING.GIRLS AT THE MOMENT ARE WEARING PASTEL SHADES AND WHITE.CUT OFF TROUSERS,BERMUDA SHORTS,BAGGY SHIRTS AND DOLLY SHOES ARE ALL IN FASHION.THERE ARE SOME EXTREME CRAZES IN FASHION SUCH AS 'PUNK'THIS MEANS WEARING AN OUTRAGEOUS HAIRSTYLE SUCH AS A MOHICAN AND WEARING BRIGHT COLOURED CLOTHES WITH CHAINS AND SAFETY PINS.WOMEN OF ALL AGES WEAR TROUSERS.MOST PEOPLE FROM 21 ON WEAR THE TYPE OF CLOTHES IN WHICH THEY FEEL MOST COMFORTABLE AND WHICH SUIT THEM BEST. FASHION IN 1985 CHANGES RAPIDLY AND MANY 'FASHIONABLE' CLOTHES ARE CHEAP AND ONLY MEANT TO LAST ONE SEASON.
